name: Journey To The Cup
description:
Play as a world cup ball that has been stolen from the transport vehicle. Make your way back to the stadium while dealing with a nasty witch. Controls (Rebindable keys) MoveWASD or ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ Aim KickLeft Click and Drag KickRelease Click Credits

Code - Nothing#3367

Art - HaywireJo#3328

Audio - Hux#1727
